Package uk.ac.tees.L1087591

This is the solution for the AJP-P2 which uses Interfaces and static modifiers.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Killable
    Killable is an interface that all the subclasses of Vehicle and Soldier.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ArmyPanel
    ArmyPanel is the main class with the GUI.
    Cadet
    Cadet is a subclass of Soldier.
    Colonel
    The Colonel.java is a subclass of Soldier and is responsible for all the Colonel objects
    HeavyTank
    HeavyTank.java is a subclass of the Vehicle.
    LightTank
    LightTank.java is a subclass of the Vehicle.
    Major
    Major.java is subclass of Soldier and is responsible for the Major objects.
    Soldier
    Soldier is a superclass for Cadet.java, Colonel.
    Vehicle
    Vehicle is a superclass for LightTank.java and HeavyTank.java.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Faction
    Faction is a Enum.
